General.Name: Optimus Gold Corp
General.Description: Optimus Gold Corp., an exploration stage company, acquires, explores for, and develops mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds interests in the Eagle Gold project that includes 150 mineral claims located in Newfoundland, Canada; the Leif Gold project, which comprises 150 mineral claims located in Newfoundland, Canada; and the Stump Lake property located in British Columbia, Canada. The company was formerly known as American Uranium Mining Corporation. Optimus Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 889 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B2
